question: 携帯ストラップ
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>携帯</ja> refers to a mobile phone? This is a <kanji>strap</kanji> (<ja>ストラップ</ja>) for a mobile phone, making this a <vocabulary>cell phone strap</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>mobile phone strap</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know the reading of <ja>携帯</ja>.
